author: "Hill, Thomas, approximately 1528-"
title: "The arte of gardening, wherunto is added much necessarie matter, with a number of secrets: and the phisicke helps belonging to each hearb, which are easily prepared. Heer-vnto is annexed two proper treatises, the first intituled The meruailous gouerment,"
imprint: "London : Imprinted by Edward Allde [part 2, H. Ballard], 1608."
